data.name: Divine Living
data.description: Welcome to Divine Living, an exceptional luxurious apartments designed for contemporary urban living situated in the dynamic neighborhood of Al Barshaa South Third. Developed by Takmeel Real Estate Development, this community features meticulously crafted 1-bedroom that offer comfort and sophistication. Residents of Divine Living enjoy access to top-notch indoor amenities, including Private Cinema, Heated Indoor Pool, Library, creating an environment that supports relaxation, fitness, and social interactions. The outdoor facilities, such as Pet-friendly Parks, Basketball Court, Outdoor Gym, provide ample opportunities for leisure, recreation, and outdoor living. The development stands out for its unique features, including Divine Living offers a distinguished living experience with cutting-edge architectural design, luxurious interiors, and a focus on comfort and convenience. Located in a prime area, the project provides seamless connectivity to major landmarks, shopping hubs, and educational institutions. Residents can enjoy world-class amenities such as landscaped gardens, state-of-the-art gyms, and serene pools, ensuring a high-quality lifestyle. The project also emphasizes sustainability with green living spaces, making it an ideal investment and residential choice.. Its prime location in Al Barshaa South Third ensures connectivity to essential services, entertainment hubs, and educational institutions, making it a perfect choice for residents seeking convenience and an upscale lifestyle. Whether you are looking for a place to call home or an investment opportunity, Divine Living caters to diverse needs with its thoughtfully designed spaces. Experience the blend of modernity and tranquility as you immerse yourself in a community built to elevate your quality of life.
data.floor_plan_description: Name: 1 bedroom Apartments - Divine Living unit_type: Apartments unit_bedrooms: 1 bedroom Area_from_sqft: None AreaFromMsq: 69.065420560748 Price_from_AED: None PriceFromUSD: 192699

data.name: Branded 2 Bedroom by Marriott Residences | Ready to Move
data.description:
Step into refined luxury with this spacious 2-bedroom apartment at Marriott Residences, where premium living meets world-class hospitality. This ready-to-move-in home is thoughtfully designed with high-end furnishings, sophisticated interiors, and modern comforts. The open-plan living and dining space is bathed in natural light, enhanced by floor-to-ceiling windows that offer breathtaking city views.

The apartment boasts a sleek, fully fitted kitchen with integrated appliances, ensuring effortless culinary experiences. Both bedrooms feature en-suite bathrooms and built-in wardrobes, creating a haven of relaxation. As a resident, enjoy exclusive access to top-tier hotel-style services and state-of-the-art amenities, making every day feel like a five-star retreat.
data.floor_plan_description: Designed for maximum comfort, this 2-bedroom apartment features a well-balanced layout with spacious living and dining areas, a contemporary open kitchen, and two well-appointed bedrooms with ample storage. The en-suite bathrooms boast luxury fittings, while the private balcony provides a serene escape with scenic city views.
highlights: Fully equipped modern kitchen with premium appliances
Access to exclusive amenities and concierge services

data.name: Branded 1 Bedroom by Marriott Residences | Ready to Move
data.description:
Step into luxury with this exquisite 1-bedroom apartment in Marriott Residences, offering a branded living experience with world-class hospitality. Designed for those who appreciate elegance and comfort, this ready-to-move-in residence features sophisticated interiors, premium furnishings, and high-end finishes that reflect the signature Marriott touch.


The open-plan layout seamlessly integrates the living and dining areas, creating a spacious and inviting atmosphere. Floor-to-ceiling windows provide ample natural light while offering stunning city views. The fully equipped modern kitchen is perfect for culinary enthusiasts, while the serene bedroom ensures a restful retreat. Residents enjoy access to exclusive hotel-like amenities, making this home the epitome of refined urban living.
data.floor_plan_description: This 1-bedroom apartment offers a thoughtfully designed layout, featuring a spacious living and dining area, a sleek open kitchen, a cozy bedroom with built-in wardrobes, and a stylish en-suite bathroom. The floor-to-ceiling windows and private balcony enhance the living experience, providing breathtaking views and an abundance of natural light.
highlights: Fully equipped modern kitchen with integrated appliances
Access to world-class amenities and 24/7 concierge services
